Growth Hormone Releasing Peptide-2

stack with CJ-PURE.

R6-Pure

Growth Hormone Releasing Peptide-6

R-6PURE increases the natural production of human growth hormone in the body and thus have the same positive effects as synthetic human growth hormone such as fat loss, extremely increase appetite, better sleep and recovery.

IPAMOR-PURE

Ipamorelin

Ipamorelin refers to a synthetic peptide that has powerful properties of releasing growth hormones, quite like R-6PURE. It is considered to be a pentapeptide, has a hugh Strength, power, fat loss, certain growth hormone pulses that allow for maximum growth overall.

FOLLISTATIN 344

Mechano Growth Factor

Follistatin 344 is a protein used in order to increase muscle mass through the suppression of myostatin. Scientists discovered it while they observed the porcine follicular fluid in the ovaries. This protein can be found in the skeletal muscle of humans and other mammals, containing carbohydrates attached to it. Follistatin 344 was the first autocrine glycoprotein supplement to become popular in search of the increased tissue mass.

TB-500

Thymosin Beta 4

43 formed amino-acid protein that regulates actin polymerization. This protein is used to improve healing of acute injuries that have a slow rate in recuperation process. Another common use of TB500- is its administration after a heart attack due to its ability to repair damaged heart tissue through activation of cardiac progenitor cells, which acts as a repair system for the body.

lyophilized (freeze-dried) white powder.

10 x 10 iu/vials

4 iu – 6 iu/day

FRAGMENT-PURE

Human Growth Hormone Fragment 176-191

HGH fragment 191-176 is a fragment molecule of growth hormone, which chains consist of 16 amino acid growth hormones (from 176 to 191). The material stimulates lipolysis (fat loss) 12 times stronger as compared with growth hormone and suppresses the formation of new fat.
